message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
It's my turn to make a fair offer.  Let's split it closer to even.  I'm willing to take a little less this round, but I think it's better than seeing our money dwindle!
Don't be greedy, Bob! This is your last chance for a decent share. The clock is ticking, and your money is shrinking!
